name: Afterglow
tagline: A live-coding lighting controller, building on the Open Lighting Architecture with Clojure and bits of Overtone.
body:
### Afterglow GitHub Pages.
For the moment, this site is being enabled in order to track versioned copies of the API documentation, so that releases can link to consistent documentation. Perhaps in the future there will be other content that deserves publishing here as well.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
